hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/ksh
VERSION=`ssh tcserver@dvappdai01 "grep Implementation-Version /opt/tcserver/instances/ops-dt/webapps/ops-dt/META-INF/MANIFEST.MF | cut -d : -f 2 | tr -d ' ' | tr -d '\r'"`
print Gathering build version to be deployed print -------------------------------------- print print Deploying version ${VERSION} print print
cd /opt/checkouts/oss_deployment/scripts
./tmpdeployapp.sh -a ops-dt -t ops-dt -e scrum2 -r ${VERSION} -i ops-dt -v
